amendment.description: To increase amounts for certain Navy shipbuilding and conversion programs, projects, and activities, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3498 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3498 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7372; text: CR S7372) To increase amounts for certain Navy shipbuilding and conversion programs, projects, and activities, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3498 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3498 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner.
